import React from 'react' import './cards.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faPlus } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; const Card = (props) => { let {question, answer, onAnswerClick } = props return ( <> {/* HR to answer the question */}
{question}

{hrAnswer}

{/* Employee to Post questions */}
) } export default Card
